extension.name: Photo Gallery (Mac Dock Effect) - Plugin
extension.author: Apptha
extension.description: Plugin for Apptha Photo Gallery (Mac Dock Effect). Include Photo Gallery (Mac Dock Effect) in a article. Code is {mac albumid='m' rows='n' cols='c'} or {mac albumid=(m) rows=(n) cols=(c)} 'm' is the albumid value, 'n' is the number of rows, 'c' is the column value. For example: 1) {mac albumid='1' rows='3' cols='3'}
